# ParsingHelper.Truncate method

Helper method which safely truncates a string to a given length

```csharp
public static string Truncate(string str, int length)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| str | String value to truncate |
| length | Maximum allowed length of the string |

## Return Value

Truncated string value
